Synvert

synvert is used to convert ruby code to better syntax.

Get Started

Installation

Synvert is distributed using RubyGems.

To install the latest version, run

$ gem install synvert

This will install Synvert, along with all of it's require dependencies.

Usage

Now you can use synvert to convert your ruby code.

$ synvert [project_path]

It's recommended that you use version control software like git, after using synvert, you can use check what changes synvert does to your ruby code.

This has been a very simple walk-through, but you should now have a general idea of how to install and use synvert.
